item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 本周伊始，交易员在中东紧张局势加剧的预期、美国明确降息信号对债券的支撑以及波音公司投资者为其后果做好准备的情况下表现谨慎。市场动态如下。【原文：Traders start the week cautiously in anticipation of more Middle East tensions, a clear US rate-cut signal supports bonds and Boeing investors brace for fallout. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 美国石油主导地位取决于新墨西哥州的宁静一角
item.description:
挑战 "欧佩克+"全球影响力的关键在于美国西南部的一小块地区，那里的钻井成本很高，而且大部分燃烧都是非法的。【原文：

The key to challenging the global influence of OPEC+ is a small swath of the American Southwest where drilling costs are high and most flaring is illegal.

】

item.title: 利比亚敌对政府将在中央银行争论中停止石油产出
item.description: 利比亚东部政府在的黎波里的竞争对手取代中央银行领导层后，宣布停止所有石油生产和出口。【原文：Libya’s eastern government announced the stoppage of all oil production and export after its Tripoli-based rival moved to replace the leadership of the central bank.】

item.title: 危险的先例 "震撼智利可再生能源市场
item.description: 智利的一项激励计划吸引了贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc）和摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A legislative change is threatening to unravel one of the world’s safest bets in renewable energy, a Chilean incentive program that lured companies backed by BlackRock Inc. and JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 鼎泰丰因消费疲软关闭中国分店
item.description: 台湾饺子连锁店鼎泰丰将关闭在中国大陆的十多家门店，在中国大陆市场，餐馆之间为吸引日益节俭的中国消费者而展开了残酷的价格战。【原文：Taiwanese dumpling chain Din Tai Fung will close more than a dozen stores in mainland China, a market that’s seen a brutal price war among restaurants to lure increasingly frugal Chinese consumers.】

item.title: 刚果反对将特拉菲古拉（Trafigura）支持的 Chemaf 公司出售给中国矿商
item.description: 刚果民主共和国表示反对将特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）支持的矿商 Chemaf Resources Ltd.出售给中国的诺林矿业有限公司（Norin Mining Ltd.）。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo signaled that it opposes the sale of Trafigura Group-backed miner Chemaf Resources Ltd. to China’s Norin Mining Ltd.】

item.title: 瑞典央行警告瑞典银行仍易受财产风险影响
item.description: 根据瑞典央行本月早些时候的政策会议纪要，瑞典的主要银行因其对 "高负债房地产公司 "的风险敞口而对金融体系构成脆弱性。【原文：Sweden’s major banks pose a vulnerability to the financial system due to their exposure to “highly-indebted property companies,” according to minutes from the Riksbank’s policy meeting earlier this month.】

item.title: 马来西亚国家石油公司就废弃油田起诉南苏丹
item.description: 马来西亚石油天然气巨头马来西亚国家石油公司（Petroliam Nasional Bhd.【原文：A unit of Malaysian oil and gas giant Petroliam Nasional Bhd. sued South Sudan for allegedly blocking a sale of its assets for $1.25 billion and instead taking over that business.】

item.title: 瑞典央行会议记录显示大幅削减关键利率的门槛很高
item.description: 瑞典央行官员在上周的会议上讨论了将借贷成本降低半个基点的方案，当时他们选择将基准利率下调 25 个基点。【原文：Officials at Sweden’s Riksbank discussed the option of a half-point reduction in borrowing costs at their meeting last week when they opted to cut the benchmark rate by 25 basis points.】

item.title: 德国经济 "陷入危机 "制约商业前景
item.description: 德国的商业前景保持在 2 月份以来的最低水平；这凸显了欧洲最大经济体在年初的反弹嘎然而止后再次被阴霾所笼罩。【原文：Germany’s business outlook held at its lowest level since February — highlighting the gloom once again engulfing Europe’s biggest economy after an early-year rebound fizzled out.】

item.title: 在杰克逊霍尔担任美联储主席的感受
item.description:
里士满联储汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）谈今年最大的经济事件之一。【原文：

The Richmond Fed’s Tom Barkin on one of the biggest economic events of the year.

】

item.title: 澳大利亚顶级养老金因 Pluralsight 重组而受到冲击
item.description: 在私人信贷机构同意收购美国教育软件公司 Pluralsight Inc.【原文：AustralianSuper, the country’s largest pension, has written down its investment in US education software firm Pluralsight Inc. after private credit lenders agreed to take ownership of the company.】

item.title: 欧洲股市开盘低迷，成交量清淡，英国放假
item.description: 周一，由于英国因国庆节休市，欧洲股市在成交量清淡的情况下结束了连续三天的上涨。【原文：European stocks snapped a three-day streak of gains on Monday amid light volumes with the UK market closed for a national holiday.】

item.title: 卡塔尔将与科威特签署为期 15 年的液化天然气供应新协议
item.description: 卡塔尔将与科威特签署一项为期 15 年的液化天然气销售新协议，这是卡塔尔签署的第二份供应协议，将有助于缓解今年夏天被迫削减产量的发电厂的压力。【原文：Qatar will sign a new deal for liquefied natural gas sales to Kuwait for 15 years, it’s second supply deal that will help ease the strain on power plants that have already been forced to cut output this summer.】

item.title: 杰克逊霍尔强化反弹押注，黄金多头欢欣鼓舞
item.description: 随着美联储准备降息、收益率下降等传统驱动因素卷土重来，以及西方投资者的重新涌入，黄金突破每盎司2,500美元的创纪录涨势似乎还有待继续。【原文：Gold’s record-setting rally above $2,500 an ounce looks to have further to run as the Federal Reserve prepares to chop rates, traditional drivers such as lower yields return, and Western investors pile back in.】

item.title: 比特币因鲍威尔中枢、ETF连续流入而濒临65,000美元
item.description: 比特币在大约三周内首次触及65,000美元，这得益于美联储将放宽货币政策的迹象导致对美国专用交易所交易基金需求的复苏。【原文：Bitcoin touched $65,000 for the first time in about three weeks, aided by reviving demand for dedicated US exchange-traded funds amid signs that the Federal Reserve is set to loosen monetary policy.】

item.title: 乌克兰空军称俄罗斯发射了无人机和导弹炮弹
item.description: 乌克兰称，俄罗斯周一向包括首都基辅在内的全国多个城市发射了无人机和导弹，并在基辅听到了爆炸声。【原文：Ukraine said Russia launched drone and missile barrages at several cities across the country on Monday including the capital Kyiv, where explosions were heard.】

item.title: 千禧年关闭亚洲两家交易中心，管理人员离职
item.description: 一位知情人士说，千禧管理公司本月关闭了在亚洲的两个指数平衡舱。【原文：Millennium Management shuttered two index-rebalancing pods in Asia this month, said a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 中国库存开始减少，铁矿石延续反弹势头
item.description: 铁矿石延续反弹势头，中国庞大的铁矿石库存继续减少，这是一个初步迹象，表明一段时期的严重供过于求局面开始缓解。【原文：Iron ore extended a rebound with China’s huge inventories of the material continuing to draw down, in a tentative sign that a period of severe oversupply is starting to ease.】

item.title: 能源价格飙升损害企业利益，新西兰采取紧急行动
item.description: 由于批发电力成本激增，一些大型制造商不得不重新审视其业务的未来，新西兰政府公布了一系列能源和电力部门的改革措施。【原文：New Zealand’s government unveiled a raft of reforms in the energy and electricity sector as it responds to a surge in wholesale power costs that has seen some large manufacturers review the future of their businesses.】

item.title: 米尔顿-弗里德曼的 "淋浴场景 "又回来了
item.description:
随着美联储摆弄货币水龙头，在市场超调的同时，预计会出现烫伤和冻伤。【原文：

As the Fed fiddles with the monetary taps, expect scalding and freezing while markets overshoot.

】

item.title: 抗议活动期间，全球对印尼债券的狂热丝毫未减
item.description: 由于越来越多的迹象表明美联储的政策将转向印尼，急于购买印尼债券的外国投资者周四仍然没有受到该国民主抗议活动的影响。【原文：Foreign investors rushing to buy Indonesian bonds on growing signs of a Federal Reserve policy pivot remained unfazed by pro-democracy protests in the country on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本医药股在市场疲软后飙升至历史新高
item.description: 本月初日本股市暴跌后，制药商股价反弹至历史新高，这表明投资者在担心全球经济增长放缓的情况下更青睐防御性股票。【原文：Drugmaker shares have rebounded to record highs after the plunge in Japanese stocks early this month, in a sign that investors favor defensive shares amid concern that global economic growth will slow.】

item.title: 日本初创企业指数跑赢 Topix 指数，创 4 月以来最大涨幅
item.description: 随着投资者将注意力转移到受益于日元走强的国内中小市值股票上，日本初创股票指数的表现超出大盘四个多月来的最大值。【原文：Japan’s startup equity gauge is outperforming the broader market by the most in over four months, as investors shift focus into domestic small and mid-cap stocks that benefit from yen strength.】

item.title: 物超所值的时尚推动印度零售股大涨 129
item.description: 在跑赢全球大多数大型零售股之后，特伦特有限公司的股价可能会随着其加入印度基准指数而进一步上涨。【原文：After outperforming most of the world’s big retail stocks, shares of Trent Ltd. may be poised to rise even further with their addition to India’s benchmark index.】

item.title: 中国就毒食用油丑闻对七家公司处以罚款
item.description: 上个月，毒食用油丑闻引发了全国范围内的食品安全轩然大波，中国对卷入该丑闻的七家公司处以罚款。【原文：China has fined seven companies for their involvement in a tainted cooking oil scandal that caused a nationwide uproar over food safety last month.】

item.title: 中国紫金矿业的勘探与开采雄心面临越来越多的威胁
item.description: 中国大型铜金生产商紫金矿业集团股份有限公司（Zijin Mining Group Co.【原文：Major Chinese copper and gold producer Zijin Mining Group Co. said a slowing global economy, geopolitical tensions, and resource nationalism could restrict its overseas deal-making ambitions.】

item.title: 野村减持中国股票，为印尼和马来西亚股票转换提供资金支持
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Investors should pare their Chinese equity holdings and put their money in Indonesia and Malaysia, according to analysts at Nomura Holdings Inc.】

item.title: 印度市场热点：Reliance AGM 即将召开，Jio 上市成为焦点
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老金设备公司寻求更多私人信贷和股权交易
item.description: 澳大利亚养老基金 Equip Super 计划在未来几年内增加价值数十亿美元的私人市场投资，将此类资产的持有量提高到其总资产的四分之一左右。【原文：Australian pension fund Equip Super plans to add billions of dollars worth of private markets investments over the next few years, lifting such holdings to around a quarter of its overall assets.】
